line.comment: Hi, [color=special]$[core.player1.name][/color]! Do you know that my friend [color=special]Jessie[/color] on the north side of town has a [color=special]beautiful heirloom[/color]? I think she [color=dim]stole it[/color] from somebody, though.
I think she [color=dim]stole it[/color] from someone named [color=special]Erin[/color] over in [color=special]Navarra[/color]. I don't know for sure, though. Maybe you should ask?
Hi, [color=special]$[core.player1.name][/color]! I hope you're not having any trouble with the [color=dim]bad guys[/color]!
I wish I could do something to help you against the [color=dim]bad guys[/color], [color=special]$[core.player1.name][/color]!

I asked [color=special]Jessie[/color] if I could wear that [color=special]heirloom[/color] she allegedly stole. However, she told me that I couldn't because I hadn't properly customized my controls in the [color=special]pause menu[/color].

Some time ago, I asked [color=special]Jessie[/color] if I could wear the [color=special]heirloom[/color] she purportedly stole from a woman east of here. Unfortunately, she told me that I couldn't because she disapproved of the way I had customized my gameplay controls in the [color=special]pause menu[/color]!
